location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 48 of 1856 from Henry Lacon Anderson, Secretary to the Government, Secret Department, Bombay to Commander James Felix Jones, Acting Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is conveying the approval of the Governor of Bombay respecting the Acting Resident's acknowledgement that great caution should be exercised to 'prevent a collision with the Persian Authorities'.
